quotes.quote: In all of living, have much fun and laughter. Life is to be enjoyed, not just endured.
Live and work but do not forget to play, to have fun in life and really enjoy it.
When fun gets deep enough, it can heal the world.
Youth expects fun in the getting, age reflects on the fun of having given
There is no pleasure in having nothing to do; the fun is having lots to do and not doing it.
It's more fun when you're not the only one having it.
The further you get away from yourself, the more challenging it is. Not to be in your comfort zone is great fun.
I am going to keep having fun every day I have left, because there is no other way of life. You just have to decide whether you are a Tigger or an Eeyore.
Make a commitment to having fun. See your best friends and make time for your hobbies and passions.
Sometimes, the simple things are more fun and meaningful than all the banquets in the world
Having fun with our creativity makes us a better artist and a better person.
It's fun to get together and have something good to eat at least once a day. That's what human life is all about — enjoying things.
You gotta have fun. Regardless of how you look at it, we're playing a game. It's a business, it's our job, but I don't think you can do well unless you're having fun.
He who does not get fun and enjoyment out of every day...needs to reorganize his life.
Rules should always be bent, if not broken. It's the only way to have any fun.
If you're not having fun, it's your own fault.
If you never did you should. These things are fun, and fun is good.
Even though you're growing up, you should never stop having fun.
There's no fear when you're having fun.
Nothing is fun until you're good at it.
It's kind of fun to do the impossible.
If you're not having fun it's not worth doing.
I think that success is having fun.
If I quit having fun, then it's time for me to quit working.
Never, ever underestimate the importance of having fun.
You must learn to enjoy life and have fun doing what you love.
People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.
If you obey all the rules, you miss all the fun.
Life is more fun if you play games.
If it's not fun, you're not doing it right.
All the fun's in how you say a thing.
As long as I'm having fun, I'm not quitting.
You must have discipline to have fun.
I try to learn from the past, but I always plan for the future by focusing exclusively on the present. That's where the fun really is.
Having fun is a choice. There is enough fun for each of us. Choosing to have fun depends on you only.
If you want to succeed in anything you do, you have to find some fun in it.
No one looks stupid when they're having fun.
Winning is only half of it. Having fun is the other half.
The purpose of fun is to live it.
I don't know how to not have fun. I'm dying and I'm having fun, and I'm going to keep having fun every day I've got left.
Old guys can still do fun things.
I've taken my fun where I've found it.
Fun is where it's at. That's why you have to be there.
It is impossible to live pleasurably without living wisely, well, and justly, and impossible to live wisely, well and justly without living pleasurably.
The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one has to do.
He who binds to himself a job /Does the winged life destroy / But he who kisses the joy as it flies / Lives in eternity's sunrise.
By happy alchemy of mind, they turn to pleasure all they find.
The secret of a happy life is to delight in duty. When duty becomes delight, then burdens become blessings.
If a man insisted always in being serious, and never allowed himself a bit of fun and relaxation, he would go mad or become unstable without knowing it.
Boys throw stones at frogs for fun. but the frogs don't die for 'fun', but in sober earnest.
We are so made, that we can only derive intense enjoyment from a contrast and only very little from a state of things.
People of the same trade seldom meet together, even for the merriment and diversion, but the conversaton ends in a conspiracy against the public, or in some contrivance to raise prices.
Can you imagine opening a bottle of champaigne with a bottle opener? I can't. It would eliminate half the fun.
You are quite right if you mean that giving up fun for no reason except that you think it's 'good' to give it up, is all nonsense
It is good fun, but it is certainly not good sense; we laugh, and disbelieve.
Frame your mind to mirth and merriment, which bars a thousand harms and lengthens life.
I wanna thank you for your love so true / Your tender lovin' keeps my mind on you / I'll pick you up and we'll go out and dance / You kiss my lips and we'll have fun, fun, fun.
When the clouds in the cosmos wanted to have some fun; they clashed playfully against each other; fomenting heavenly droplets of liquid to tumble down in rhapsodic frenzy.
I was drunk and it was fun, / At least I think, for it did not return; / To keep save in my memory, / The last 16 hours lived by me.
I’m just having fun, but no doubt someone will take this serious / I’m about to take you on a lyrical experience / I’m having fun with words, like when a baby first starts reading books.
Work can be fun, and men can enjoy it; then it's not labour. / Let's have it so! Let's make a revolution for fun!
If you make a revolution, make it for fun, / don't make it in ghastly seriousness, / don't do it in deadly earnest, / do it for fun.
I've taken my fun where I've found it, / An' now I must pay for my fun, / For the more you 'ave known o' the others / The less will you settle to one.
We’re so busy watching out for what’s just ahead of us that we don’t take time to enjoy where we are.
The life you have left is a gift. Cherish it. Enjoy it now, to the fullest. Do what matters, now.
Everyone wants to live on top of the mountain, but all the happiness and growth occurs while you’re climbing it.
Children are the most desirable opponents at scrabble as they are both easy to beat and fun to cheat.
Searching is half the fun: life is much more manageable when thought of as a scavenger hunt as opposed to a surprise party.
Sometimes, it's better to bunk a class and enjoy with friends, because now, when I look back, marks never make me laugh, but memories do.
When you combine boring with fear, you have fun.
About the only time losing is more fun than winning is when you're fighting temptation.
Man consists of two parts, his mind and his body, only the body has more fun.
